title: Andoni Gago
text:
Andoni Gago Lopez (born 8 May 1985) is a Spanish <a href="professional%20boxer">professional boxer</a> who held the <a href="European%20Boxing%20Union">European</a> <a href="featherweight">featherweight</a> title from 2019 to August 2021.
Professional career.
Gago made his professional debut on 16 March 2012, scoring a four-round <a href="unanimous%20decision">unanimous decision</a> (UD) victory against Ryan Peleguer at the Frontón Bizkaia in <a href="Bilbao">Bilbao</a>, Spain.
After compiling a record of 21–3–3 (6 KOs), he defeated Jesus Sanchez via twelve-round <a href="split%20decision">split decision</a> (SD) on 8 June 2019 at the <a href="Bilbao%20Arena">Bilbao Arena</a> to capture the vacant <a href="List%20of%20European%20Boxing%20Union%20champions%23Featherweight">European featherweight title</a>. Two judges scored the bout in favour of Gago with 115–114 and 115–113, while the third judge scored it 116–112 for Sanchez.
